description: Returns information about DNSSEC for a specific hosted zone, including the key-signing keys (KSKs) in the hosted zone.

parameters.name: HostedZoneId
parameters.description: A unique string used to identify a hosted zone.

nested_items.name: ServeSignature
nested_items.description: A string that represents the current hosted zone signing status.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message provided for the following DNSSEC signing status: INTERNAL_FAILURE. The status message includes information about what the problem might be and steps that you can take to correct the issue.

nested_items.name: KeySigningKeys
nested_items.description: The key-signing keys (KSKs) in your account.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A string used to identify a key-signing key (KSK). Name can include numbers, letters, and underscores (_). Name must be unique for each key-signing key in the same hosted zone.

nested_items.name: KmsArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) used to identify the customer managed key in Key Management Service (KMS). The KmsArn must be unique for each key-signing key (KSK) in a single hosted zone.
DescribeKey.
GetPublicKey.
Sign.

nested_items.name: Flag
nested_items.description: An integer that specifies how the key is used. For key-signing key (KSK), this value is always 257.

nested_items.name: SigningAlgorithmMnemonic
nested_items.description: A string used to represent the signing algorithm. This value must follow the guidelines provided by RFC-8624 Section 3.1.

nested_items.name: SigningAlgorithmType
nested_items.description: An integer used to represent the signing algorithm. This value must follow the guidelines provided by RFC-8624 Section 3.1.

nested_items.name: DigestAlgorithmMnemonic
nested_items.description: A string used to represent the delegation signer digest algorithm. This value must follow the guidelines provided by RFC-8624 Section 3.3.

nested_items.name: DigestAlgorithmType
nested_items.description: An integer used to represent the delegation signer digest algorithm. This value must follow the guidelines provided by RFC-8624 Section 3.3.

nested_items.name: KeyTag
nested_items.description: An integer used to identify the DNSSEC record for the domain name. The process used to calculate the value is described in RFC-4034 Appendix B.

nested_items.name: DigestValue
nested_items.description: A cryptographic digest of a DNSKEY resource record (RR). DNSKEY records are used to publish the public key that resolvers can use to verify DNSSEC signatures that are used to secure certain kinds of information provided by the DNS system.

nested_items.name: PublicKey
nested_items.description: The public key, represented as a Base64 encoding, as required by RFC-4034 Page 5.

nested_items.name: DSRecord
nested_items.description: A string that represents a delegation signer (DS) record.

nested_items.name: DNSKEYRecord
nested_items.description: A string that represents a DNSKEY record.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A string that represents the current key-signing key (KSK) status.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message provided for the following key-signing key (KSK) statuses: ACTION_NEEDED or INTERNAL_FAILURE. The status message includes information about what the problem might be and steps that you can take to correct the issue.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the key-signing key (KSK) was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The last time that the key-signing key (KSK) was changed.
